title: üí∞ 2-Bedroom Apartment Renovation Estimate: 60 m¬≤
description: Detailed renovation estimate for a 2-bedroom apartment: materials, labor, expenses. Real budgeting example.
author: Renohacks

body.raw:
# üí∞ 2-Bedroom Apartment Renovation Estimate: 60 m¬≤

Renovation isn't just beautiful‚Äîit's expensive. To avoid going into the red halfway through, you need to plan your budget. This article contains a real renovation estimate for a typical 2-bedroom apartment of **60 square meters**.

---

## üìä Apartment Specifications

- **Total area:** 60 m¬≤
- **Bedrooms:** 2
- **Kitchen:** 9 m¬≤
- **Bathroom:** 4 m¬≤
- **Toilet:** 2 m¬≤
- **Hallway:** 8 m¬≤
- **Balcony:** 3 m¬≤

---

## üíµ Total Estimate

| Category | Amount |
|----------|--------|
| Materials | $12,000 |
| Labor | $6,000 |
| **TOTAL** | **$18,000** |

Cost per m¬≤: **~$300**

> üí° **Note:** Prices are converted from Russian rubles (1.25M ‚ÇΩ) at an approximate rate. Actual costs vary significantly by location, material quality, and contractor rates in your area.

---

## üß± Rough Materials

### Wall and Ceiling Leveling

| Material | Quantity | Price |
|----------|----------|-------|
| Drywall (12.5 mm) | 30 sheets | $2,500 |
| UD Profile 27√ó28 | 30 pcs | $500 |
| CD Profile 60√ó27 | 50 pcs | $900 |
| Hanger direct | 100 pcs | $350 |
| Starting putty (30 kg) | 15 bags | $1,350 |
| Finishing putty (30 kg) | 8 bags | $1,000 |
| Primer (10 L) | 12 cans | $1,200 |
| Reinforcing mesh | 80 m¬≤ | $1,700 |
| **Total** | | **$9,500** |

### Flooring

| Material | Quantity | Price |
|----------|----------|-------|
| Cement-sand mix M150 | 80 bags | $2,200 |
| Betonokontakt | 10 cans | $2,100 |
| Foam plastic 50 mm | 25 m¬≤ | $1,200 |
| Vapor barrier | 60 m¬≤ | $500 |
| **Total** | | **$6,000** |

### Electrical (rough)

| Material | Quantity | Price |
|----------|----------|-------|
| VVG cable 3√ó2.5 mm¬≤ | 200 m | $1,700 |
| VVG cable 3√ó1.5 mm¬≤ | 100 m | $600 |
| ABB circuit breakers | 12 pcs | $1,300 |
| RCD 30 mA | 3 pcs | $800 |
| 20-module panel | 1 pc | $500 |
| Outlets + switches | 45 pcs | $1,900 |
| Light fixtures | 25 pcs | $2,100 |
| **Total** | | **$8,900** |

### Plumbing (rough)

| Material | Quantity | Price |
|----------|----------|-------|
| PVC pipes for sewage | 30 m | $1,200 |
| PPR pipes for water | 50 m | $2,100 |
| Valves | 10 pcs | $1,100 |
| **Total** | | **$4,400** |

**Rough Materials: TOTAL ‚Äî $28,800**

---

## üé® Finish Materials

### Tiles

| Purpose | Area | Price per m¬≤ | Total |
|---------|------|--------------|-------|
| Bathroom (walls) | 15 m¬≤ | $170/m¬≤ | $2,550 |
| Bathroom (floor) | 4 m¬≤ | $210/m¬≤ | $840 |
| Kitchen (backsplash) | 5 m¬≤ | $140/m¬≤ | $700 |
| Hallway (floor) | 8 m¬≤ | $170/m¬≤ | $1,360 |
| Tile adhesive | 150 kg | ‚Äî | $800 |
| Grout | 20 kg | ‚Äî | $400 |
| **Total** | | | **$6,650** |

### Flooring (laminate)

| Material | Area | Price per m¬≤ | Total |
|----------|------|--------------|-------|
| Laminate class 33 | 40 m¬≤ | $110/m¬≤ | $4,400 |
| Underlay | 40 m¬≤ | $11/m¬≤ | $440 |
| Baseboard | 50 m | $35/m | $1,750 |
| **Total** | | | **$6,590** |

### Wall and Ceiling Paint

| Material | Area/Quantity | Price | Total |
|----------|---------------|-------|-------|
| Wall paint | 120 m¬≤ | $55/bucket (10L) | $3,300 |
| Ceiling paint | 60 m¬≤ | $48/bucket (10L) | $1,450 |
| Brushes, rollers | ‚Äî | ‚Äî | $400 |
| **Total** | | | **$5,150** |

### Doors and Windows

| Material | Quantity | Price per pc | Total |
|----------|----------|--------------|-------|
| Interior doors | 4 pcs | $1,100/pc | $4,400 |
| Door frames | 4 pcs | $280/pc | $1,120 |
| Door closers | 4 pcs | $210/pc | $840 |
| Plastic windows | 4 pcs | $2,100/pc | $8,400 |
| **Total** | | | **$14,760** |

### Bathroom

| Material | Quantity | Price | Total |
|----------|----------|-------|-------|
| Acrylic bathtub 170 cm | 1 pc | $3,500 | $3,500 |
| Compact toilet | 1 pc | $1,700 | $1,700 |
| Sink | 1 pc | $1,100 | $1,100 |
| Faucets (bathtub, sink) | 2 pcs | $800/pc | $1,600 |
| Mirror | 1 pc | $400 | $400 |
| **Total** | | | **$8,300** |

### Kitchen

| Material | Quantity | Price | Total |
|----------|----------|-------|-------|
| Kitchen set (8 m) | ‚Äî | $28,000 | $28,000 |
| Countertop | 3 m | $2,100 | $2,100 |
| Sink + faucet | 1 set | $1,400 | $1,400 |
| Built-in appliances | 4 pcs | $16,800 | $16,800 |
| **Total** | | | **$48,300** |

**Finish Materials: TOTAL ‚Äî $89,750**

---

## üë∑ Labor Costs

| Type of Work | Area/Volume | Price per unit | Total |
|--------------|-------------|----------------|-------|
| Demolition | ‚Äî | ‚Äî | $4,200 |
| Electrical work | ‚Äî | ‚Äî | $7,000 |
| Plumbing work | ‚Äî | ‚Äî | $5,600 |
| Wall leveling (drywall) | 120 m¬≤ | $63/m¬≤ | $7,560 |
| Wall puttying | 120 m¬≤ | $42/m¬≤ | $5,040 |
| Wall painting | 120 m¬≤ | $28/m¬≤ | $3,360 |
| Ceiling painting | 60 m¬≤ | $35/m¬≤ | $2,100 |
| Tile installation | 32 m¬≤ | $112/m¬≤ | $3,580 |
| Laminate installation | 40 m¬≤ | $56/m¬≤ | $2,240 |
| Door installation | 4 pcs | $350/pc | $1,400 |
| Baseboard installation | 50 m | $21/m | $1,050 |
| Waste removal | ‚Äî | ‚Äî | $2,100 |
| Material purchase | ‚Äî | ‚Äî | $4,200 |
| **Total** | | | **$51,830** |

---

## üí° Savings Tips

1. **Buy materials in bulk** ‚Äî discounts up to 15%
2. **Do some work yourself** ‚Äî painting, laminate installation
3. **Compare prices at different stores**
4. **Buy during sale seasons** (January, May, September)
5. **Don't buy everything at once** ‚Äî spread out the budget

---

## üìù Summary

**Total renovation cost: $18,000**

- Materials: **$12,000** (68%)
- Labor: **$6,000** (32%)

**üí° Pricing notes:**
- Prices converted from Russian rubles at ~$1 = 70 ‚ÇΩ
- US: $15,000‚Äì$25,000 (similar quality)
- UK: ¬£12,000‚Äì¬£20,000
- EU: ‚Ç¨12,000‚Äì‚Ç¨22,000
- Actual costs vary by region, materials, and labor rates
